title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in the library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the library outline view.

Observed behavior (OB): When attempting to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.

Expected behavior (EB): When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, it should be selected on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce (SR):
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the library outline view.
